response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. It's not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its value to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $11,000. We believe this is a fair and generous offer considering the $12,000 value it holds for you. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 11000}
